fields.name: Effect:
fields.value:
Put 2 players that have not Dueled this phase into a Duel. If the two players have a greater than 3 card difference in the cards held in their Hand (excluding (Satcheled) cards), then the Duel is wasted. You will be informed of such.   

*Both players will try to earn more Card Points than the opponent by playing cards. The winner gets to gain a card of their choice (including Duel-wons). Selecting your Duel-Won card is considered a critical action. Check <#1191646674897084466> for information on Dueling and Card Points. You may not play a Duel?! during Rollover or Peacetime.*
